name: BeatCovid
description:
BeatCovid is an arcade game where you can save the world just sitting on your sofa. There are extra hard levels and one simple for training. Find a vaccine and cure your patient, but be aware of your enemies. They are ill and will certainly try to infect you.

• Enjoy driving 4 types of transport.
• Shoot with antibodies to disarm your enemies.
• Buy new clothes for your character in the shop.
• Get creative while looking for the vaccine, sometimes it can be hard.
